      • Cut

        public boolean Cut(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 v1,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 v2,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body b,
                   float r)
        Checks if the fruit is cut, The fruit is cut if the first 2 points of the cut are inside the area of the shape of the body
        Parameters:
        v1 - First point of the cut
        v2 - Second point of the cut
        b - body (fruit)
        r - radius of the shape
        Returns:
        true if fruit is cut , false if not
